descriptions: Teams net points while player is on the court.
Teams net points while player is on the court.

videos.description: Max Strus challenges Trey Lyles at the rim and wins the battle with an and-1 bucket.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Max Strus with the and-1 bucket) 2021/12/24 ESHEET

videos.headline: Max Strus meets Trey Lyles at the rim for an and-1 finish

videos.description: Tyler Herro gets inside with a Eurostep lay-in.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Tyler Herro impresses with nice bucket) 2021/12/24 ESHEET

videos.headline: Herro Eurosteps through for a layup

videos.description: Tyler Herro bursts through the lane with a lefty layup plus a foul.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Tyler Herro with the and-1 bucket) 2021/12/24 ESHEET

videos.headline: Herro scoops in a lefty layup plus a foul

videos.description: Kyle Lowry muscles inside and scores a layup.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Kyle Lowry impresses with nice shot) 2021/12/24 ESHEET

videos.headline: Lowry gets to the rim for a layup

videos.description: Udonis Haslem scores the tough basket plus the foul.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Udonis Haslem gets the basket plus the foul) 2021/12/24 ESHEET

videos.headline: Haslem flicks up an and-1 bucket

videos.description: Tyler Herro beats the shot clock with a fadeaway triple to give the Heat the lead.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Tyler Herro buries triple against Detroit Pistons) 2021/12/24 ESHEET

videos.headline: Herro plays hero ball late with ridiculous trey

videos.description: Max Strus breaks a late tie and knocks down a 3-pointer to lift the Heat.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Max Strus drills 3 in from Miami Heat vs. Detroit Pistons) 2021/12/24 ESHEET

videos.headline: Max Strus puts Heat up for good with a 3
